title: Legal action launched over sham marriage screening algorithm
description: A legal charity warns a Home Office system used to identify bogus marriages could be discriminatory.

title: How Helsinki became the mobile gaming capital of the world
description: The Finnish capital attracts top gaming talent, while Netflix is setting up its gaming division there.

title: Bao Fan: Chinese tech banker's firm reports him missing
description: Bao Fan's company China Renaissance says they've not been able to make contact with their chairman.

title: US regulator charges cryptocrash boss Do Kwon with fraud
description: Terraform Labs founder Do Kwon has been accused of "orchestrating a multi-billion dollar crypto" scheme.

title: The race across Europe to build green steel plants
description: A project is underway in northern Sweden which will drastically cut CO2 emissions in making steel.
